rooms.description: Entrance area with foyer leading into living spaces. Follows Vastu principles ensuring the main door faces east or north for auspicious entry.
Contemporary living area with ample natural light. Designed in an open space concept to allow flow between dining and kitchen areas.
Spacious dining area integrated with living space. Open plan layout promotes family interactions.
Modern kitchen equipped with contemporary fixtures and appliances. Positioned to ensure efficient workflow.
Luxurious master bedroom with a private balcony for relaxation and natural light. Positioned in accordance with Vastu for tranquility.
Guest bedroom offering comfort and style. Features a dedicated balcony for fresh air.
Bathroom attached to the master bedroom. Designed with contemporary fixtures and a minimalist style.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east as per Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Door opening from master bedroom leading to private balcony.
Door opening from guest bedroom leading to dedicated balcony.
Garage entry ensuring easy access for two cars. Located adjacent to the main entrance area.

garage.description: Contemporary garage integrated with the main structure. Follows local building norms.
